thread.section_title: AllGifts.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AllGifts.ie | allgifts.ie
thread.title: Irmgard

author: Irmgard
title: Irmgard
text: I had €110 in my account so I ordered a Tesco gift card for €100. It arrived within two days, which was mega fast! The only problem I found that I couldn't get it for the full €110, and most of the other options were the same, you had to spend in increments of €50. I finally found that I could give the remainder to charity, so happy days. I do feel, however, that you should be able to get gift cards in smaller amounts than €50. The selection of partners was very good, too.
